## RadioButton PT Options

| Value | Label | Options | Description |
|:------|:------|:--------|:------------|
| **1** | **root** | instance: any<br/>props: RadioButtonProps<br/>state: RadioButtonState<br/>context: RadioButtonContext<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the root's DOM element. |
| **2** | **input** | instance: any<br/>props: RadioButtonProps<br/>state: RadioButtonState<br/>context: RadioButtonContext<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the input's DOM element. |
| **3** | **box** | instance: any<br/>props: RadioButtonProps<br/>state: RadioButtonState<br/>context: RadioButtonContext<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the box's DOM element. |
| **4** | **icon** | instance: any<br/>props: RadioButtonProps<br/>state: RadioButtonState<br/>context: RadioButtonContext<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to pass attributes to the icon's DOM element. |
| **5** | **hooks** | instance: any<br/>props: RadioButtonProps<br/>state: RadioButtonState<br/>context: RadioButtonContext<br/>attrs: any<br/>parent: any<br/>global: undefined &#124; object | Used to manage all lifecycle hooks. |
